title: Penguins notebook: Former Wheeling goalie now a backup in Montreal
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Penguins - Today 
Two years removed from being the Wheeling Nailersâ€™ starting goaltender, Mike Condon began this season as the Montreal Canadiens backup....
